poem: You Are Stronger Than Your Scars

about.title: About
about.c1: samproduce.com is a website as well as a personal research project. This project was created in March 2018 for personal learning about networking and cloud computing. In the beginning, I registered the domains zezhuyu.com and zezhuyu.me so that I could connect to my home server. Over the next four years, the project spawned more and more sub-projects. As of March 2022, the project has sub-projects including but not limited to SAM CLOUD, SAM CDN & APPX, and SCLRNET. SAM CLOUD is a personal cloud learning project that focuses on cloud storage, cloud computing, and hardware virtualization. SAM CDN & APPX is a personal edge computing and storage platform that focuses on serverless and object storage and relies on SCLRNET to deliver content quickly to the requesting party. SCLRNET is a personal network learning and research project that focuses on routing and network protocols to peer with many content delivery networks and some Tier 1 NSPs around the world. operates personal backbone and pilot networks and provides network access to most personal projects and services.
about.c2: I am a technology enthusiast and love all electronics. Also a programmer. Currently studying at the University of Toronto Mississauga. In my spare time, I like photography, making videos, listening to music and sleeping.
